text: Charlie Alexander Villanueva (born August 24, 1984) is a Dominican-American former professional basketball player. He played 11 seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA). He played for the Toronto Raptors, Milwaukee Bucks, Detroit Pistons, and Dallas Mavericks. title: Charlie Villanueva
